title: 351: CHATTY BROS: Bachelor Recap & Tarot Bros
itunes:title: 351: CHATTY BROS: Bachelor Recap & Tarot Bros
description:
The Bros are here to talk all things Bachelor but first they take a call with #broadsquad member Grace (winner of The Bros Tarot Reading) to pull a card! Then they dive into Clayton’s episode and chat about the dates - but MOSTLY talk Shanae and her shrimp…and of course somehow Tyler Cameron gets brought up. Then it’s time for a little Plug Something’!

 

PLUG SOMETHIN’:

***Cantilever: @callitcantilever www.callitcantilever.com

***Torborg Hardwin: @torgborg_hardwin www.torborg.us/
